    A fairly simple socket server.
    Author:
    maartenl
    See Also:
    tutorial/networking/sockets/clientServer.html

    • Constructor Detail

      • SocketProxyServer

        public SocketProxyServer(@Nonnull
                 int proxyPort,
                 @Nonnull
                 java.lang.String serverHost,
                 @Nonnull
                 int serverPort)
        Construction of the socket proxy server.
        Parameters:
        serverHost - hostname/ip address of the server to forward messages to.
        proxyPort - the port that this deamon will listen on.
        serverPort - the port that this daemon will forward all messages to on the actual server.

    • Method Detail

      • startServer

        public void startServer()
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Start the server... will not return.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if something goes wrong.

      • addListener

        public void addListener(SocketListener listener)
        Adds a listener to the proxy socket server. Bear in mind that currently there is only one listener allowed. Calling this method a second time will replace the existing listener.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to report conversations to.
